levels.description: Upon skill activation, Mudrock stops attacking and does not take damage for <@ba.vup>{sleep}</> seconds, and reduces the Movement Speed of surrounding enemies by <@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</>; After this state ends, Mudrock <$ba.stun>Stuns</> surrounding ground enemies for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds and gains <@ba.vup>reduced</> Attack Interval, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>, and the ability to attack all blocked enemies
